Sentencas: Oxidation behavior of porous P434L ferritic stainless steel, used for the fabrication of metalsupported solid oxide electrolysis cells (MS-SOEC), is studied under oxygen-side and steamside conditions.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The impact of oxygen content on the oxygen side and steam:hydrogen ratio on the steam side is determined at 700 degrees C for bare, as-sintered samples.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: For these conditions, oxidation is more aggressive in the steam-side atmosphere.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Oxygen with 3% humidification and steam:hydrogen ratio of 90:10 are selected for further assessment with pre-oxidized, catalyst-coated, and CuMn1.8O4-coated samples.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The rapid oxidation at 700 degrees C and breakaway oxidation at 600 degrees C observed for bare stainless steel in 90:10 steam:hydrogen is mitigated by pre-oxidizing the sample in air before exposure.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: In oxygen, addition of the catalyst or CuMn1.8O4 coatings moderately increases the oxidation rate, due to consumption of Cr via reaction between the coatings and Cr-oxide scale.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The results for ex-situ controlled oxidation are similar to oxidation observed after 1000 h operation of a full MS-SOEC.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: In general, the oxidation behavior at 700 degrees C is found to be acceptable.
Titulo: Oxidation of porous stainless steel supports for metal-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells
